Description: 2017 Gibson Traditional HP in absolutely mint condition. Looks to be barely touched at all. You cannot go wrong with this purchase. Lovely flame, not captured very well in the pictures, it is much more beautiful in person. Shipping is free, and probably is extremely expensive since the case alone weighs 30-35 lbs. The guitar weighs 9.0 lbs. So all total the weight is roughly 40 lbs... Case is unreal, you could probably run over it with a truck and not damage the guitar. Here are the details of the guitar:Gibson Les Paul Traditional 2017 HP Extra-wide Soloist neck for high-speed playing If you like the look of a classic Les Paul, but long for a more modern-feeling guitar, you'll love the Gibson Les Paul Traditional 2017 HP's comfortable Soloist neck. This extra-wide neck was tailor-made for high-speed soloing, providing you with added width but the same string spacing. A fast-access heel adds to the comfort of this fast-playing neck. Powerful, punchy electronics plus killer appointments Two of Gibson's best-loved pickups - Burstbucker 2 and 3+ humbuckers - give the Les Paul Traditional 2017 HP the power, punch, and clarity of Gibson's legendary PAF pickups, while revolutionary wiring delivers an arsenal of 150 tonal variations via internal dip switches and push-pull functionality on all four knobs. At Sweetwater, we also really dig the Les Paul Traditional 2017 HP's premium, high-performance appointments, including Supreme Grip speed knobs, next-generation G Force tuners, titanium adjustable zero-fret nut, and chrome Tune-o-matic bridge with titanium saddles and stopbar. Plek'd for precision playability This Gibson Les Paul Traditional 2017 HP feels fast and precise, thanks in large part to Plek processing. Typically reserved for top-dollar custom guitars, this process levels the frets with pinpoint precision, providing you with the most playable fretboard you're likely to own. Each note rings loud and clear, and the fret edges feel smooth as silk. Gibson Les Paul Traditional 2017 HP Features: · USA-made Les Paul with high-performance appointments · Classic mahogany body and maple top deliver singing sustain · Extra-wide Soloist neck is tailor-made for high-speed playing · Burstbucker 2 and 3+ humbuckers kick out powerful, punchy humbucker tones · Internal dip switches and push-pull functionality on all four knobs deliver 150 tonal variations · G Force automatic tuning system delivers perfect intonation - and more · Zero-fret nut and Tune-o-matic bridge let you easily adjust your guitar's action with a hex key Tech Specs Body Type Solidbody Body Shape Les Paul Left-/Right-handed Right-handed Number of Strings 6 Body Material Mahogany Top Material AAA Grade Flamed Maple Body Finish Nitrocellulose Lacquer Color Honey Burst Neck Material Mahogany Neck Shape Soloist width, Slim taper Fingerboard Material Rosewood, bound Fingerboard Inlay Mother-of-Pearl Trapezoid Number of Frets 22 Scale Length 24.75" Nut Width 1.745" Nut Material Titanium adjustable zero fret Bridge/Tailpiece Aluminum tune-o-matic bridge with titanium saddles Tuners 2017 G-Force tuners Neck Pickup BurstBucker 2 Humbucker Bridge Pickup BurstBucker 3+ Humbucker Controls 2 x volume (push/pull coil-tap, split), 2 x tone (push/pull phase, coil select), 5-way DIP (treble bleed, transient suppression) Case Included HP Aluminum case
Title: Gibson Les Paul Traditional 2017 HP - Honey Burst
ConditionDescription: This guitar is in absolutely mint condition. No dings, scratches, scuffs or anything. Could be sold as new and nobody would know the difference. Beautiful all the way around!!!
